name: Aircraft Modern Sky 3D
description:
Fly solo as a lone wolf or command a fleet of acrobatic aircraft to establish air superiority over the battlefield. Perform dizzying acrobatic maneuvers, get the enemy in your sights and hit the trigger to shoot them down. Become the supreme lord of the skies in Aircraft Modern Sky 3D
FEATURES:
- Detailed realistic airplanes
- Never ending environment to fly and battle in!
- Aircraft weapons like, homing missiles nukes, and so much more!
- Both touch and tilt controls, calibrate to your preference
- Challenging enemy plane A.I.
